subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Since winning the World Series in 2008, Philadelphia has added three aces — Roy Halladay, Roy Oswalt and Cliff Lee — to join the homegrown Cole Hamels in forming a formidable rotation.
snippet: Since winning the World Series in 2008, Philadelphia has added three aces — Roy Halladay, Roy Oswalt and Cliff Lee — to join the homegrown Cole Hamels in forming a formidable rotation.
